DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect rosuvastatin compare placebo aortic stiffness hemodialysis patient measure pulse wave velocity ( 3 , 6 12 month )
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Rosuvastatin Aortic Stiffness Hemodialysis Patients AURORA Study
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent , 50 80 year age , end stage renal failure patient receive hemodialysis Received statin within past 6 month , clear indication use lipid alter drug , contra indication lipid alter drug , history statin induce myopathy item
